description:
Plunder powder with the Marauder Elite's wide field of view and fog-defeating ventilation. Updated with Spy’s toric lens technology, you get a crystal clear and distortion-free view of the world around you. All styles include a bonus lens, so you can scope the perfect line in any conditions.

  • Fits medium to larger faces best
  • SPY Happy lenses heighten contrast and colour without effecting clarity
  • ARC lens is thicker in the middle, tapered toward the edges for optically correct, distortion-free viewing from all angles
  • Anti-fog injected SIC™ (Superior Injected Curve) double-layered thermal lenses have anti-fog and anti-scratch protection
  • Deadbolt™ lens change system uses the power of magnets for proper alignment and a simple locking lever to keep everything in place, making lens changes easy, even while wearing gloves
  • Flexible polyurethane frame conforms to any face for a comfortable fit
  • RISE™ ventilation system combats lens fogging by forcing air through the frame
  • Triple layer Isotron™ face foam is 3 different densities and features moisture wicking Dri-ForceTM fleece
  • Silicone ribbed strap won't slip
  • Includes a spare low-light Happy Coral lens with red spectra and 54% visible light transmission
name: Spy+ Marauder Elite Snow Goggles - Unisex
